page.title: 12Art and Crafts
page.content: Being a rural area various arts and crafts are undertaken,the majority being peoples hobbies.Crafts under taken are painting,embroidary of all types,crochet,press flower picture,tapestry,weaving,soft toy making and paper craft. Knitting is very popular with women,both with needles or machine.Machine knitting is becoming more popular with local tuition available if required. In the community there is 1 potter who has a flourishing buisness.He currently uses 2 tons of white clay per month and uses a 127wft kiln. Throughtout the year are various shows in which crafts are displayed and judged in particular WI. Generally speaking for a small community the arts and crafts are plentiful and of a high standard.
